attributes.action: Freeze MPs Pay and Allowances until such time as the Economy Recovers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Treasury has effectively imposed a Pay Freeze on Civil Servants. The Opposition have pledged that on coming to power, they will freeze Public Sector Pay for at least a year.
Since MPs are, themselves, paid from the public purse, they should lead by example and forego any further increases in their pay and allowances until such time as the Economy recovers. Furthermore, once the Economic situation improves, MPs pay should once again be linked to Civil Service rates of pay
